text: Wookieepedia (the Star Wars Wiki) is an online encyclopaedia for information on the Star Wars fictional universeâ€”including information of all eleven films, as well as Expanded Universe. It is written from an in-universe perspective. The name Wookieepedia is a mix of Wookiee and encyclopaedia, based on the name of Wikipedia. Wookieepedia is hosted by Fandom. Some articles have 60,000 words. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:Wikis Category:Star Wars
title: Wookieepedia
